actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to establish a temporary select committee to study the Congressional budget process, including proposals for a two-year budget and other aspects of the Congressional budget process.

summary.text: Establishes for the first session of the 99th Congress the Senate Select Committee on the Two Year Budget to review and recommend legislative proposals to improve the operation of the congressional budget process, including proposals for the two-year budget. Requires a report from such committee within 180 days after adoption of this resolution.

titles.title: A resolution to establish a temporary select committee to study the Congressional budget process, including proposals for a two-year budget and other aspects of the Congressional budget process.
